name: hyperspace-hole
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.

flavor_text.x_y: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.
